title: 18 Cheap (But Expensive-Looking) Area Rugs You Can Buy on Amazon
text:
18 items in this article 5 items on sale! Photo: Courtesy of the vendor

The quickest way to kill the thrill of moving into a new apartment is settling in and noticing that the furniture that looked good in your previous home is totally wrong in your new space. One way to pull together your hodgepodge collection of Ikea pieces, street finds, and vintage furniture is by rolling out an area rug, an instant fix that “ties the room together” and adds a bit of coziness underfoot. (We’re of the opinion that there’s nothing like sprawling out on a cushy floor rug after a long day.) After speaking to plenty of interior designers about their favorites, we’ve learned that area rugs can quickly get expensive, but luckily there are also a ton of affordable options out there in a range of on-trend styles like Moroccan and sheepskin, as well as rugs made from natural fiber. Below, we’ve rounded up 18 of the nicest-looking area rugs you can buy on Amazon to help make your home feel a little more pulled together. And for more affordable Amazon finds, check out our list of the 11 best area rugs, as praised by hyperenthusiastic reviewers.

Unique Loom Tribal Moroccan Nomad Plush Area Rug - 5' x 8' Moroccan-inspired rugs are everywhere these days, as the thick pile and abstract designs make them a popular choice in homes of all décor aesthetics. But getting an authentic one woven by members of the Berber tribe, for instance, can be costly. Here’s an extremely affordable option inspired by the real deal, with traditional shapes and lines that would look great paired with a streamlined sofa. Bonus points for the fact that it’s waterproof, stain resistant, and, importantly, does not shed. $65 at Amazon Buy $65 at Amazon Buy

Safavieh Dallas Shag Collection - 8'x10' This Moroccan-style rug looks especially plush, and the diamond trellis pattern is generous in scale. $135 at Amazon Buy $135 at Amazon Buy

nuLOOM Dotted Diamond Trellis Wool Rug, 4' x 6' $100 (was $111, now 10% off) Here’s a contemporary twist on that instantly recognizable diamond trellis in 100 percent wool. It seems perfect for a nursery. $100 at Amazon Buy $100 at Amazon Buy

Rivet Distressed Color Medallion Area Rug, 5' 3” x 7' 7" If you prefer a rug with a more traditional pattern, there’s a bunch of handsome Persian-inspired ones that come pre-distressed for that lived-in look. We love the medallion and deep red and blue dyes on this one. $149 at Amazon Buy $149 at Amazon Buy

Ottomanson Ottohome Persian Heriz Oriental Design, 60" L x 78" W $39 (was $46, now 15% off) A stain-resistant Persian rug for the die-hard The Big Lebowski fan. $39 at Amazon Buy $39 at Amazon Buy

Nourison Passion Persian Colorful Area Rug, 5'3" X 7'3" $72 (was $82, now 12% off) The unexpected pink, gray, and teal colors give this Persian rug a contemporary twist. $72 at Amazon Buy $72 at Amazon Buy

Stone & Beam Lottie Traditional Wool Area Rug, 5' x 8' You can’t beat the price on this wool-and-cotton, hand-tufted rug in the most delicious neutrals. $156 at Amazon Buy $156 at Amazon Buy

Stone & Beam Modern Global Ikat Wool Area Rug, 5 x 8 Foot The abstract, oversize ikat pattern on this wool-and-cotton area rug would bring a boho feel to any space. $156 at Amazon Buy $156 at Amazon Buy

Stone & Beam New England Tassled Wool Farmhouse Area Rug, 5' x 8' There’s something about the soothing blue pattern of this hand-tufted, wool-and-cotton rug that makes it impossible not to stare at. Pair it with a pristine white sofa and you’re on your way to a magazine-worthy living room. $156 at Amazon Buy $156 at Amazon Buy

Rivet Wool Rug, 5'x8' The stark zebra lines of this wool-and-cotton blend certainly make a statement (namely, that it appears way more expensive than it is). $149 at Amazon Buy $149 at Amazon Buy

Unique Loom Williamsburg Collection Casual Striped Area Rug, 5' x 8' $62 (was $178, now 65% off) For something a little less wild, but still eye-catching, try this low-pile rug with offset striping. $62 at Amazon Buy $62 at Amazon Buy

nuLOOM Takisha Triangle Geometric Area Rug We love how festive this one is and think it would look so fun in a family den or playroom. $110 at Amazon Buy $110 at Amazon Buy

Outlavish Sheepskin Rug Genuine Soft Natural Merino, 2' x 6' $125 (was $220, now 43% off) Do your feet a favor and put this — which, as its name suggests, is real sheepskin — by your bed. $125 at Amazon Buy $125 at Amazon Buy

Safavieh Faux Silky Sheepskin Ivory Area Shag Rug, 5’ x 8’ Another sheepskin option, if you want to cover more floor space (and to go the synthetic route). $153 at Amazon Buy $153 at Amazon Buy

Unique Loom Solo Solid Shag Gray Rug $53 (was $64, now 17% off) For ultimate coziness, you can’t beat a straight-up shag rug. The cool gray color helps this from veering too far into Austin Powers territory. $53 at Amazon Buy $53 at Amazon Buy

Safavieh Natural Fiber Collection Basketweave Summer Seagrass Area Rug, 5’ x 8’ Incorporate a natural-fiber rug in your home to keep the summer vibes going all year long. $100 at Amazon Buy $100 at Amazon Buy

description: We’ve rounded up the best-looking and most affordable area rugs on Amazon, including styles like Moroccan, shag, striped, sheepskin, vintage, Persian, and more, from brands like Safavieh, nuLoom, Stone and Beam, and Rivet.
